description:
THE STREETS OF NEO-DENVER ARE AN IRRADIATED MESS — SMOKE FROM THE HYPERPROCESSOR FACTORIES THREATEN TO CHOKE OUT WHAT LIFE REMAINS — TIMES ARE HARD, THE PEOPLE HARDER

YOU ARE CHALLENGED TO A GAME

A game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (theme: "Roll of the Dice")! Play a novel blend of pinball and turn-based battler and fight against the powerful leader of a street gang. Win, and you'll be rewarded handsomely; lose, and- judging by their leering snarl- you can only assume it won't be pretty.

CONTROLS + HOW TO PLAY

  • Hold space or the down arrow and release to launch the pinball!
  • Use the left and right arrow keys to control the flippers!
  • There are three phases, attack, defend, and chance!
  • High pinball points give you better outcomes in each phase, and high dice rolls do the same. Build up points, but if you have a good die be careful to avoid the reroll zone!
